parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the power steering system can cause the steering wheel to become difficult or impossible to turn, leading to loss of vehicle control, accidents, or injuries.
symptoms: The steering wheel becomes difficult or impossible to turn
the power steering warning light comes on
the vehicle pulls to one side
the steering wheel feels heavy or unresponsive
the vehicle is unable to turn
and warning messages such as "Steering Assist Fault" or "Service Advance Trac" appear on the dashboard.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The loosening or detachment of the steering wheel can cause loss of vehicle control, accidents, or injuries.
symptoms: The steering wheel feels loose or detached
the steering wheel almost comes off while driving
the vehicle is difficult to steer
and warning messages related to steering or power steering appear on the dashboard.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the EPAS system can cause the steering wheel to become difficult or impossible to turn, leading to loss of vehicle control, accidents, or injuries.
symptoms: The steering wheel becomes difficult or impossible to turn
the power steering warning light comes on
the vehicle pulls to one side
the steering wheel feels heavy or unresponsive
and warning messages such as "Steering Assist Fault" or "Service Advance Trac" appear on the dashboard.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the electrical system can cause the vehicle to stall, lose power, and experience various electrical issues, which can lead to accidents, inconvenience, and safety risks.
symptoms: Vehicle stalling
loss of power
electrical issues
warning lights illuminating
backup camera malfunction
instrument panel lighting up with numerous codes
driver's seat regressing backwards
side view mirror moving
and ignition turning on independently.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the infotainment system can cause the display to turn off, making most of the vehicle's functions useless, and can lead to safety risks, such as uncontrollable heat, sound levels, and loss of hands-free and backup camera functionality.
symptoms: Display turning off
display stuck in a boot cycle
error code "Desktop.exe has stopped working"
and loss of functionality of heated/cooled seats
entertainment
climate controls
navigation
and radio.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the trunk module can cause the trunk to fail to close, leading to battery drain and potential safety risks.
symptoms: Trunk failing to close
battery drain
and trunk module needing to be replaced.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the clutch and transmission can cause the vehicle to stall, making it difficult or impossible to shift gears, which can lead to accidents or leave the driver stranded.
symptoms: Vehicle stalling
clutch pedal feeling soft or spongy
clutch pedal sticking to the floor
and difficulty shifting gears.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: Transmission failure can cause the vehicle to abruptly stop while driving, leading to accidents and potential injuries.
symptoms: Vehicle suddenly dies while driving
transmission shifts gears independently
transmission failure warning light appears on the dashboard.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: Powertrain issues can cause the vehicle to stall or die while driving, leading to accidents and potential injuries.
symptoms: Vehicle stalls or dies while driving
powertrain warning light appears on the dashboard
DTC code P188B appears.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: Push button shift control issues can cause the vehicle to move unexpectedly, leading to accidents and potential injuries.
symptoms: Vehicle moves unexpectedly
driver confusion with push button shift control
vehicle shifts gears independently.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: AWD system malfunction can cause the vehicle to lose traction and control, leading to accidents and potential injuries.
symptoms: AWD system warning light appears on the dashboard
AWD system turns off during driving
DTC code P188B appears.
